author: AMY FORLITI, STEVE KARNOWSKI and TAMMY WEBBER
title: For 3 more officers at Floyd killing, jury says: Guilty
description: ST. PAUL, Minn. (AP) — The three Minneapolis police officers alongside Derek Chauvin at the scene of George Floyd's killing offered a variety of reasons why they weren't to blame: Inexperience. Bad training.
